rukus.text: And inhabitants of the rock (people of Thamud) have certainly denied the messengers
And We gave them Our signs, but they were turning away from it
And they carved houses in the mountain being safe
But the awesome roar took them in the morning
Then what they were doing was of no use to them
And We did not create the skies and the earth and what is between them except with the truth, and certainly the hour is coming, so pardon them, a beautiful pardon
Indeed your Master, He is the knowledgeable creator
We have given you seven of the repeated ones and the great Quran
Do not stretch out your eyes to (and be dazzled by) what We made some of them enjoy it, and do not be sad about them, and spread your wing for the believers
And say: Indeed I am the clear warner
(Warning about) such (punishment) as We sent down on the dividers
those who made Quran into parts (and believed only in parts of it)
So, by your Master, We shall question them all
about what they were doing
So explain publicly what you are ordered, and stay away from the polytheists
Indeed We are sufficient for you against those who ridicule
those who set up another god with God. They will know
We have certainly known that your chest tightens (and you get upset) because of what they say
So glorify Your Master with praise, and be of those who show humbleness
and serve your Master until the certainty/death comes to you
